data.text:
MOPA is a Media, All-In-One agency based in Australia, China, New Zealand, and Singapore for marketing-communication, cultural exchange, business development, and blockchain development. Strong in the sectors of celebrities, stars in movies, and TV/Online shows, also in branding for consumer goods, fashion, luxury, and automotive. At present, mainly covering China and Asia Pacific market, our team has both local Chinese as well as international experience that we apply to each project, we have exclusive networks which including seniors even founders of the top media, celebrities in TV series, internet shows, music-dancing shows and films. Part of our members hold lawyer licenses in China. This boutique agency was founded with the idea to create independently and craft the details of each specific brand's creative direction, rather than trying to fit the brand requirements into a pre-designed package. MOPA works mainly on projects such as makeup for celebrities and stars, advertorial, advertising, editorial with celebrities and stars, events, and PR, and with a strong focus on brand building in the Chinese market. We are dedicated to delivering consistent results across different platforms to meet target goals. Since 2017, in the emerging market such as the blockchain industry, we provide due diligence and mining solutions.

Website

https://www.mopa1.com
